records.Name: R-00001
records.Comments__c: Beautiful trail with amazing views. Highly recommend for experienced hikers!

records.Name: R-00002
records.Comments__c: Perfect for families. The lake is beautiful and the trail is easy to navigate.

records.Name: R-00003
records.Comments__c: Great forest trail with lots of wildlife. Some parts were a bit challenging.

records.Name: R-00004
records.Comments__c: The coastal views are spectacular! Bring a windbreaker as it can get breezy.

records.Name: R-00005
records.Comments__c: Challenging desert hike but worth it for the unique landscape.
